definition: Man has but one life, grass but one spring (idiom). fig. the brevity of human existence
pinyin: ren2 sheng1 yi1 shi4 , cao3 mu4 yi1 chun1

definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
